title: Who's Calling?!

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record a phone ringtone onto the switch.
• Have the switch user prank people by pressing the switch to make the ringtone play.
• Prompt the switch user to press the switch again by making statements such as "who's phone keeps ringing?" or "not again!"

tooltipText: Prank people by making a phone ringtone noise with the switch!
